channel.title: Where do you host your cache?
channel.description: I'm curious what the best place is to get reasonable download speeds. What do you use?

item.title: Where do you host your cache?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“hadesflames, post:8, topic:442991”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=545680.msg4002188#msg4002188 date=1338172875]
Very soon here I am going to start distributing the cache and other large files for MoparScape 4 via bittorrent. I have the client code already written, I just have to find time to iron out a few bugs here and there.
[/quote]

Although that does pose the problem of requiring seeders.[/quote]

Not necessarily, because each downloader can be a seeder, and the torrent client I use supports HTTP seeds, which means it can download chunks from multiple webservers.

Read full topic
item.source: Where do you host your cache?

@hadesflames wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Very soon here I am going to start distributing the cache and other large files for MoparScape 4 via bittorrent. I have the client code already written, I just have to find time to iron out a few bugs here and there.

Although that does pose the problem of requiring seeders.

You should host using your own server / servers to guarantee accessibility.

item.title: Where do you host your cache?
item.dc:creator: @Zarpor Zarpor
item.description:
@Zarpor wrote:

Upgraded to Dropbox Premium after getting suspended for using too much bandwidth and still going strong! Although with an excessively popular server 200GB a day might not cut it.

Read full topic
